amendment.description: That Robert D. Edmonson of the District of Columbia be, and is hereby, chosen Clerk of the House of Representatives; ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to nominate Democrat candidates for Officers of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Crowley.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment Failed by voice vote.
